text:
AC LV SWBD - 1200 to 6000A, 480 / 600VAC
UL 891 Certified Switchboards for Critical Power Applications
In critical power infrastructure reliability efficiency and communications are paramount. EPEC Solutions is pleased
to present our modular switchboard, designed for critical power applications. Engineered with precision and
designed for high performance, this switchboard is the perfect solution for data centers and other critical power
requirements that seek to optimize power management and availability.
PRODUCT DETAILS
• 480VAC, 600VAC, 3P3W or 3P4W
• UL / NEMA 1 or 3R
• Main breaker ranges: 1200A – 5000A
(6000A air cooled), MLO up to 6000A
• Single ended or double ended (M-M or
M-T-M)
• Feeder ranges ACB: 1200A, 1600A,
2000A, 2500A
• Feeder ranges MCCB: 150AF, 250AF,
400AF, 600AF, 800AF, 1200AF
• Feeder trip type: Thermal Mag or
Electronic Trip
Pictured above: UL 891 / NEMA 3R, 480 / 277VAC, 4000A SWBD, exterior
• Interrupt Ratings:
view.
➢ 100kAIC @ 480VAC
➢ 65kAIC @ 600VAC
Ample Power Capacity
• Full front access, incoming / outgoing
Our 6000A Switchboard delivers the power capacity you
bottom or top entry
• Direct bus / busway option (side) for need, ensuring your data center or other critical requirement
main / ACB feeder can handle the most demanding workloads. With the ability
• Control compartment / section M-T-M to manage high currents, this switchboard is built to support
control schemes
the robust needs of large-scale data centers.
• Adv. diagnostics / comm / metering
Intelligence for Diagnostics, Metering and Switching
Our switchboards utilize Siemens’ state-of-the-art
power (3WA) and molded case (3VA6) circuit breakers.
Full metering and diagnostics for each circuit is available
from advanced trip units. The information is easily
made available to via Modbus TCPTM or other ethernet /
PLC protocol. If advanced communication is not
required standard trip units are available.
Electrical Panels ∙ Engineering ∙ Controls by EPEC Solutions, Inc.
Visit our site: www.epecsolutionsinc.com Contact: info@epecsolutionsinc.com

UL 891 Certified Switchboards for Critical Power Applications
Pictured left: UL 891 / NEMA 3R, 480 / 277VAC, 4000A
SWBD, double ended, with: cable input section, 4000A
main, ACB feeder section, MCCB feeder, 2nd 1600A main, 2nd
cable input section. ATS controller compartment above
4000A main.
Enhanced Safety Features
Safety is our top priority. The 6000A Switchboard
comes with state-of-the-art safety features,
including advanced circuit protection (AERMS per
NEC 240.87) and fault detection capabilities. This
Future-Proof your Critical Power Application ensures not only the safety of your equipment
Our 6000A switchboard is not just a product, it is a but also your personnel.
long-term investment. Its scalable design allows for
easy upgrades and expansions, ensuring it can meet

the needs of your data center both now and in the
EPEC is a proven leader in the design and build LV
future. Designed on the newest version of Siemens’
AC switchboards in the demanding solar, energy
circuit breaker technology, your equipment will
storage, and EV charging industries. We
stand up to the test of time.
understand that downtime is not an option for
your data center. That is why our 6000A
Switchboard is designed for maximum reliability.
It’s robust construction and advanced engineering
ensure consistent performance and minimal
maintenance.
The EPEC 6000A switchboard is more than just a
power solution; it’s a strategic asset that will

switchboards are utilized in over 1 gigawatt of solar installations.
